review_blob: This is a truely delicious IPA.  What makes this beer work its balance. It is obviously very hoppy, its an IPA. But it works because these brilliant citrusy hops are balanced well with its madly rich carmel tones. That is what makes this favorite so drinkable and delicious.
beer_name: Lost Coast Indica India Pale Ale

review_blob: I was a little disappointed with this beer in comparison with other Anderson Valley beers. Dont get me wrong this is still a very good beer, but it is more suitable for being an everyday beer than a special occasion ESB.

What makes this beer special are its complex malty tones. Its aroma before tasting is quite deceptive in that it doesnt give you really any idea of what you are in for. Once you taste it your senses come alive (pun intended) and you will really enjoy the full character of this complex beer
